item.title: 【Unreleased/Unofficial (lossless)】FLAC - Madonna - A "12 inch Celebration" (24bits/96kHz)
item.description:
A "12 Inch Celebration" is a compilation of remixes by British producer, sound engineer, and film score composer DRM (Digitally Remastered Music).

DRM has carefully selected his favorite mixes from the most popular ones on his channel. As the title implies, this collection celebrates Madonna’s remarkable career in the music industry, coinciding with her highly praised Celebration Tour in 2024, featuring songs from 1984 to 1995.
For those new to DRM’s work, this collection offers contemporary 12-inch versions of Madonna’s hits and fan favorites, some of which are extended for the first time in an authentic manner.

Enjoy and visit his YouTube channel!! https://youtube.com/@digitallyremasteredmusic

Hi-Res FLAC 24Bits/96kHz / 3.08GB

Tracklist

1. Dress You Up (The Pajama 12")
2. Like A Virgin (Shiny and New 12")
3. Over and Over (Extended Mix)
4. Pretender (Extended Version)
5. Crazy For You (Extended Version)
6. Gambler (12" Roulette Mix)
7. Open Your Heart (Peep Show Remix)
8. True Blue (12" Truthfull Mix)
9. Papa Don't Preach (Original 12" Mix)
10. White Heat (Extended 12" Mix)
11. Till Death Do Us Part (Remix)
12. Cherish (Cupid 12")
13. Like A Prayer (Mother Mary Mix)
14. Act Of Contrition (Expended Confessions)
15. Rain (Extended Version)
16. Erotica (12" Dita Mix)
17. Bad Girl (Drunk by Six Mix)
18. Justify My Erotic Love
19. Bedtime Story (Astral Mix)
20. I'd Rather Be Your Lover (Extended Solo Mix)
21. You'll See (Extended Departure Mix)
